meanings.sent1: Some overoptimists believe everything will always turn out perfectly.
meanings.sent2: Overoptimists tend to see the bright side of every situation.
meanings.sent3: The group of overoptimists thought they could finish the project in one day.
meanings.sent4: In a world of overoptimists, reality can sometimes be a harsh wake-up call.
meanings.sent5: The overoptimists' unwavering positivity was both inspiring and unrealistic.

meanings.definition: The state of being overly optimistic.
meanings.sent1: Overoptimists can sometimes overlook potential risks.
meanings.sent2: The overoptimists' outlook on life was infectious.
meanings.sent3: Despite the challenges, the team maintained a sense of overoptimists.
meanings.sent4: The market crash served as a reminder to the dangers of overoptimists.
meanings.sent5: Her overoptimists led her to believe she could achieve anything she set her mind to.
